text: Ezɨ gumazir maba ghua Atrivim Solomon mɨgɨa ghaze, “Adoniya nɨn atiatigha ghua, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Purirpenimɨn aven ghua ovengan atiatigha, ofa gamir dakozimɨn mɨkebabar itir bulmakaun kombar mɨn garir bizibar suiki. Adoniya kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Kɨ ofa gamir dakozimɨn suiraghvɨra ikɨ mangɨtɨ, Atrivim Solomon, na mɨsueghtɨ kɨ aremeghan koghsɨ a Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzir gavgavitam damuam.’ ”
